item.sql: SELECT a.ARCHIVE_SEQ, a.BIZ_CATEGORY || '-' || substr(a.DESCRIPTION, 1, decode(instr(a.DESCRIPTION, '-'),0,100,instr(a.DESCRIPTION, '-')-1)) as BIZ, b.AD_NAME, a2.ARCH_ID, a2.ARCH_ACTION, a2.REQ_NAME, 1 차수, a2.START_TIME, a2.ELLAPSED_TIME, a2.ROWS_ARCHIVED, a2.TABLE_NAME, a2.ARCHIVED_ROWS, a2.P_AD_NAME, a2.BIZ_NAME, a2.START_DATE, a2.END_DATE, a2.P_ARCH_ID, a2.PRE_ARCH_ID, a2.BIZ_CODE, a2.CUTOFF_DATE, a2.LEDGERID, a2.PERIODFROM, a2.PERIODTO, a2.BUDVER, a2.APP_SH_NAME, a2.APP_ID, a2.LEDGER_ID, a2.START_BP, a2.END_BP, a2.START_MON, a2.END_MON -- a2.* FROM OPTIM.ARCH_POLICY_INFO a, OPTIM.ARCH_SEQ_INFO b, ( SELECT c.ARCH_ID, c.ad_name, c.ARCH_ACTION, c.req_name, c.start_time, c.ellapsed_time, c.rows_archived, c.TABLE_NAME, c.ARCHIVED_ROWS, d.archive_seq, d.P_AD_NAME, d.BIZ_NAME, d.START_DATE, d.END_DATE, d.P_ARCH_ID, d.PRE_ARCH_ID, d.BIZ_CODE, d.CUTOFF_DATE, d.LEDGERID, d.PERIODFROM, d.PERIODTO, d.BUDVER, d.APP_SH_NAME, d.APP_ID, d.LEDGER_ID, d.START_BP, d.END_BP, d.START_MON, d.END_MON FROM ( SELECT first_value(aa.ARCH_ID) over( partition BY aa.AD_NAME ORDER BY aa.ARCH_ID DESC ) latest, aa.ARCH_ID, aa.AD_NAME, aa.ARCH_ACTION, aa.REQ_NAME, aa.ARCHIVE_SEQ, bb.START_TIME, bb.ELLAPSED_TIME, bb.ROWS_ARCHIVED, bb.ROWS_INSERTED, bb.ROWS_EXTRACTED, cc.TABLE_NAME, cc.ARCHIVED_ROWS FROM OPTIM.ARCH_JOB_INFO aa, OPTIM.ARCH_JOB_RESULT bb, OPTIM.ARCH_JOB_RESULT_DTL cc WHERE aa.ARCH_ID = bb.ARCH_ID AND aa.ARCH_ACTION = 'A' AND aa.STATUS = 'C' AND aa.ARCH_ID = cc.ARCH_ID ) c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT arch_id, archive_seq, param_name, param_value FROM OPTIM.ARCH_JOB_PARAM_INFO ) PIVOT( MAX(PARAM_VALUE) FOR PARAM_NAME IN( 'AD_NAME' as P_AD_NAME, 'BIZ_NAME' as BIZ_NAME, 'START_DATE' as START_DATE, 'END_DATE' as END_DATE, 'ARCH_ID' as P_ARCH_ID, 'PRE_ARCH_ID' as PRE_ARCH_ID, 'BIZ_CODE' as BIZ_CODE, 'CUTOFF_DATE' as CUTOFF_DATE, 'LEDGERID' as LEDGERID, 'PERIODFROM' as PERIODFROM, 'PERIODTO' as PERIODTO, 'BUDVER' as BUDVER, 'APP_SH_NAME' as APP_SH_NAME, 'APP_ID' as APP_ID, 'LEDGER_ID' as LEDGER_ID, 'START_BP' as START_BP, 'END_BP' as END_BP, 'START_MON' as START_MON, 'END_MON' as END_MON ) ) ) d WHERE c.ARCH_ID = c.latest AND c.ARCH_ID = d.ARCH_ID(+) AND c.ARCHIVE_SEQ = d.ARCHIVE_SEQ(+) ) a2 WHERE a.ARCHIVE_SEQ = b.ARCHIVE_SEQ and b.ARCHIVE_SEQ = a2.ARCHIVE_SEQ(+) AND b.AD_NAME = a2.AD_NAME(+) AND b.AD_NAME not like '%_AP' -- and a2.start_time > to_date('2016-10-18', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.archive_seq = 'XLA007' --and b.ad_name = 'WIP.AD_WIP_PA' ORDER BY 1, 3

with tt as ( select a.archiveid, a.datetimeofarchive, a.groupname, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias--, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarcvfile2 a, pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by a.archiveid, a.datetimeofarchive, a.groupname, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') as dt, groupname from tt ) PIVOT(count(1) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by dt

with tt as ( select a.archiveid, a.datetimeofarchive, a.groupname, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias--, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by a.archiveid, a.datetimeofarchive, a.groupname, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') as dt, groupname from tt ) PIVOT(count(1) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by dt

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select dt, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by dt

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by dt

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by TIME

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by TIME

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_char(to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by TIME

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_char(to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by TIME

with tt as ( select to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM') as dt, a.groupname, count(1) as cnt --, listagg(b.tablename, ', ') within group (order by tablename) as tables from pstarchdata.pstarcvfile2 a, pstarchdata.pstarcvtbl2 b where a.archiveid = b.archiveid group by to_char(to_date(datetimeofarchive, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24.MI.SS'), 'YYYY-MM'), a.groupname, a.arcvfilename--, b.tabledbalias -- order by 1 desc, a.arcvfilename, b.tabledbalias ) select * from ( select to_char(to_date(dt, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TIME, groupname, cnt from tt ) PIVOT(sum(cnt) FOR groupname IN( 'AR', 'XXPA', 'BALANCES', 'XXAHL', 'XXINV', 'BUDGET', 'XLA', 'XLACA', 'AHL', 'XXONT', 'PA', 'ZX', 'XXAR', 'CST', 'CSI', 'JOURNAL', 'INV', 'XXCST', 'WIP' ) ) order by TIME
